CmdLine: apt-get update &&     DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive apt-get install -y         build-essential         git         python3-pip         wget         xz-utils     && apt-get clean && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: mkdir /opt/clang+llvm-7.0.1/ &&     cd /opt/clang+llvm-7.0.1/ &&     wget --progress=dot:giga http://releases.llvm.org/7.0.1/clang+llvm-7.0.1-x86_64-linux-gnu-ubuntu-16.04.tar.xz -O -          | tar -x -I xz --strip-components=1 &&     for file in bin/*;     do         ln -s $PWD/$file /usr/bin/$(basename $file)-7.0;     done &&     cp /opt/clang+llvm-7.0.1/lib/libomp.so /opt/clang+llvm-7.0.1/lib/libomp.so.5
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: mkdir /opt/cmake-3.14.5/ &&     cd /opt/cmake-3.14.5/ &&     wget --progress=dot:giga https://cmake.org/files/v3.14/cmake-3.14.5-Linux-x86_64.tar.gz -O -         | tar -xz --strip-components=1 &&     for file in bin/*;     do         ln -s $PWD/$file /usr/bin/$(basename $file);     done
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: for bin in /opt/cppcheck-1.*/bin/cppcheck-1.*; do         ln -s $bin /usr/bin/;     done
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: for file in /opt/boost-1.70.0/include/*; do         ln -s $file /usr/include/;     done &&     for file in /opt/boost-1.70.0/lib/*; do         ln -s $file /usr/lib/;     done
Commands.Name: run
